statements: SELECT id, username, high_score FROM player_data WHERE high_score > 100;
SELECT * FROM player_data WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, high_score FROM player_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, password FROM player_data WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT id, username, high_score FROM player_data ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT id, username, high_score FROM player_data WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND high_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, username, high_score FROM player_data WHERE high_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, high_score FROM player_data WHERE password = 'secure123' OR high_score < 50 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players, AVG(high_score) AS average_score FROM player_data;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, high_score FROM players WHERE high_score > 100;
SELECT player_id, username, high_score FROM players ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, high_score FROM players WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT player_id, username, MAX(high_score) AS highest_score FROM players GROUP BY player_id, username;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, username FROM players WHERE high_score > 100 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, high_score FROM players WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND high_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM leaderboards JOIN players ON leaderboards.player_id = players.player_id WHERE level = 5 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT p.username, l.score FROM players p JOIN leaderboards l ON p.player_id = l.player_id WHERE l.score > 200;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, high_score FROM players WHERE high_score > 100;
SELECT player_id, score, rank FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE login_attempts < 3 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT id, username, password FROM players WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, high_score FROM players ORDER BY high_score DESC
SELECT p.username, l.score, l.rank FROM players p INNER JOIN leaderboard l ON p.id = l.player_id
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE login_attempts > 5 ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT p.username, a.last_login, a.login_attempts FROM players p INNER JOIN authentication a ON p.id = a.player_id ORDER BY a.last_login ASC
SELECT * FROM player_auth;
SELECT id, username FROM player_auth ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT player_id, high_score FROM player_stats WHERE high_score > 100;
SELECT player_id, display_name FROM player_profile ORDER BY display_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, friend_id FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 1 AND friend_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM player_auth WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM player_auth WHERE id = 5;
SELECT username, password FROM player_auth WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT p.display_name, ps.high_score FROM player_profile p JOIN player_stats ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id;
SELECT p.display_name, COUNT(pf.friend_id) AS friend_count FROM player_profile p LEFT JOIN player_friends pf ON p.player_id = pf.player_id GROUP BY p.display_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, high_score FROM users JOIN player_stats ON users.user_id = player_stats.user_id;
SELECT users.username, player_inventory.item_name, player_inventory.quantity FROM users INNER JOIN player_inventory ON users.user_id = player_inventory.user_id WHERE quantity > 0;

SELECT users.username, achievements.achievement_name, achievements.description FROM users INNER JOIN user_achievements ON users.user_id = user_achievements.user_id INNER JOIN achievements ON user_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;
SELECT user_id, username, item_name, quantity FROM users LEFT JOIN player_inventory ON users.user_id = player_inventory.user_id WHERE quantity IS NULL;
